metadata.title: USN-5099-1 -- Imlib2 vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Imlib2 incorrectly handled certain ICO images. An attacker could use this issue to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5099-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libimlib2-dev - 1.6.1-1ubuntu0.1 libimlib2 - 1.6.1-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
